title: We Celebrate Shower With A Friend Day - KF/AF
description:
Get 15% off your first pair at http://meundies.com/morning

Get your first refill pack free at http://getquip.com/KFMS

The Commish, Xavier Woods, delivers a special message, we celebrate National Shower with A Friend Day, recap the Super Bowl, and Ask Andy Anything.

Time Stamps -
00:04:35 - Connect Between 3 and 5
00:12:28 -  Message from The Comish
00:22:25 - Quip
00:23:49 - MeUndies
00:25:15 - Photoshop Challenge
00:38:30 - All Sorts of Sport
00:41:18 - National Eat Ice Cream for Breakfast Day
00:51:25 - Ask Andy Anything
00:56:46 - Next Week’s Photoshop Challenge

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino 
Andy - http://www.twitter.com/MaximumCortez
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
